metadata.name: pokeball_game
metadata.description: Pokemon Trader Solana - On-chain game program

instructions.name: consume_randomness
docs: Anyone can call after ORAO fulfills randomness.
Determines catch/miss for throws, sets position for spawns.

accounts.name: payer
docs: Anyone can crank this (typically the player or a backend service).

accounts.name: vrf_randomness
docs: ORAO VRF randomness account. Must match the seed in vrf_request.
We manually deserialize RandomnessAccountData (enum) from the raw data.

accounts.name: nft_vault
docs: NFT vault — needed for catch+award flow.

accounts.name: player_inventory
docs: Player inventory — needed for throw results to update stats.
Optional: only required for throw requests.

accounts.name: winner
docs: The player/winner wallet — needed as destination owner for NFT transfer.

instructions.name: deposit_nft
docs: Authority deposits a Metaplex NFT into the vault.

accounts.name: nft_mint
docs: The NFT mint (Metaplex NFT = SPL token with 0 decimals, supply 1).

accounts.name: source_nft_account
docs: Authority's NFT token account (source).

accounts.name: vault_nft_account
docs: Vault's NFT token account (destination, PDA-owned ATA).
Created if it doesn't exist.

instructions.name: despawn_pokemon
docs: Authority despawns a Pokemon from a slot.

instructions.name: force_spawn_pokemon
docs: Authority spawns a Pokemon at specific coordinates (no VRF).

instructions.name: initialize
docs: Initialize the game. Creates GameConfig, PokemonSlots, NftVault, TreasuryConfig.
One-time call by the authority.

accounts.name: solballs_mint
docs: The SolBalls token mint.

accounts.name: game_solballs_account
docs: The game's SolBalls token account (PDA-owned ATA).
Receives SolBalls from ball purchases.

instructions.name: purchase_balls
docs: Player purchases balls by transferring SolBalls tokens.
Auto-creates PlayerInventory PDA on first purchase.

accounts.name: player_token_account
docs: Player's SolBalls token account (source).

accounts.name: game_solballs_account
docs: Game's SolBalls token account (destination, PDA-owned).

accounts.name: player_inventory
docs: Player inventory PDA. Created on first purchase via init_if_needed.

instructions.name: reposition_pokemon
docs: Authority repositions an existing Pokemon.

instructions.name: set_ball_price
docs: Authority updates ball price for a tier.

instructions.name: set_catch_rate
docs: Authority updates catch rate for a tier.

instructions.name: set_max_active_pokemon
docs: Authority updates max active Pokemon soft cap.

instructions.name: spawn_pokemon
docs: Authority requests a random spawn via ORAO VRF.

accounts.name: vrf_request
docs: VRF request PDA for tracking this spawn request.

accounts.name: vrf_config
docs: ORAO VRF network state.

accounts.name: vrf_randomness
docs: ORAO VRF randomness account — will be created by the CPI.

accounts.name: vrf_treasury
docs: ORAO VRF treasury to pay the 0.001 SOL fee.

instructions.name: throw_ball
docs: Player throws a ball at a Pokemon. Requests ORAO VRF for catch determination.

accounts.name: vrf_request
docs: VRF request PDA for tracking this throw.

accounts.name: vrf_config
docs: ORAO VRF network state.

accounts.name: vrf_randomness
docs: ORAO VRF randomness account — will be created by the CPI.

accounts.name: vrf_treasury
docs: ORAO VRF treasury.

instructions.name: withdraw_nft
docs: Authority withdraws an NFT from the vault (admin recovery).

accounts.name: vault_nft_account
docs: Vault's NFT token account (source, PDA-owned).

accounts.name: authority_nft_account
docs: Authority's NFT token account (destination).
Created if it doesn't exist.

accounts.name: nft_mint
docs: The NFT mint.

instructions.name: withdraw_revenue
docs: Authority withdraws SolBalls revenue from game account.

accounts.name: game_solballs_account
docs: Game's SolBalls token account (source, PDA-owned).

accounts.name: authority_solballs_account
docs: Authority's SolBalls token account (destination).

errors.name: InvalidBallType
errors.msg: Invalid ball type. Must be 0-3 (Poke, Great, Ultra, Master)

errors.name: InsufficientBalls
errors.msg: Insufficient ball balance for this throw

errors.name: MaxAttemptsReached
errors.msg: Maximum throw attempts reached for this Pokemon

errors.name: InvalidMaxActivePokemon
errors.msg: Invalid max active Pokemon value. Must be 1-20

errors.name: NftNotInVault
errors.msg: NFT mint not found in vault

errors.name: ZeroQuantity
errors.msg: Purchase quantity must be greater than 0

errors.name: PurchaseExceedsMax
errors.msg: Purchase exceeds maximum allowed per transaction

errors.name: VrfAlreadyFulfilled
errors.msg: VRF request has already been fulfilled

errors.name: VrfNotFulfilled
errors.msg: VRF randomness not yet fulfilled by ORAO

errors.name: ZeroBallPrice
errors.msg: Ball price must be greater than 0

errors.name: Unauthorized
errors.msg: Unauthorized: only authority can call this instruction

errors.name: NftTransferAccountsMissing
errors.msg: NFT transfer accounts not found in remaining_accounts for the awarded mint

types.name: GameConfig
docs: Global game configuration. Single PDA for the entire game.

fields.name: authority
docs: Owner/admin wallet that can manage spawns, prices, and withdraw revenue.

fields.name: treasury
docs: Treasury wallet receiving 3% of revenue (off-chain split).

fields.name: solballs_mint
docs: SolBalls SPL token mint address.

fields.name: usdc_mint
docs: USDC SPL token mint address.

fields.name: ball_prices
docs: Ball prices in SolBalls atomic units: [poke, great, ultra, master].

fields.name: catch_rates
docs: Catch rates 0-100 percent: [poke, great, ultra, master].

fields.name: max_active_pokemon
docs: Soft cap on active Pokemon (1-20, default 20).

fields.name: pokemon_id_counter
docs: Auto-incrementing Pokemon ID counter.

fields.name: total_revenue
docs: Total SolBalls received from all purchases.

fields.name: is_initialized
docs: Whether the game has been initialized.

fields.name: vrf_counter
docs: VRF request counter for generating unique seeds.

fields.name: bump
docs: PDA bump seed.

types.name: NftVault
docs: NFT vault tracking which Metaplex NFTs are held.
Actual NFTs are in PDA-owned token accounts (one ATA per mint).

fields.name: authority
docs: Authority that can deposit/withdraw NFTs.

fields.name: mints
docs: Mint addresses of NFTs currently in the vault (max 20).
Using a fixed-size array to avoid Vec realloc issues.

fields.name: count
docs: Number of NFTs currently in the vault.

fields.name: max_size
docs: Maximum vault capacity.

fields.name: bump
docs: PDA bump seed.

types.name: PlayerInventory
docs: Per-player ball inventory and lifetime stats.

fields.name: player
docs: Player's wallet pubkey.

fields.name: balls
docs: Ball counts: [poke, great, ultra, master].

fields.name: total_purchased
docs: Lifetime total balls purchased.

fields.name: total_throws
docs: Lifetime total throws.

fields.name: total_catches
docs: Lifetime total successful catches.

fields.name: bump
docs: PDA bump seed.

types.name: PokemonSlot
docs: Individual Pokemon spawn data.

fields.name: is_active
docs: Whether this slot has an active Pokemon.

fields.name: pokemon_id
docs: Unique Pokemon ID (from GameConfig.pokemon_id_counter).

fields.name: pos_x
docs: X position (0-999).

fields.name: pos_y
docs: Y position (0-999).

fields.name: throw_attempts
docs: Number of throw attempts against this Pokemon (0-3).

fields.name: spawn_timestamp
docs: Unix timestamp when this Pokemon was spawned.

types.name: PokemonSlots
docs: Holds all 20 Pokemon spawn slots.

fields.name: slots
docs: Array of 20 Pokemon slots.

fields.name: active_count
docs: Number of currently active Pokemon.

fields.name: bump
docs: PDA bump seed.

types.name: TreasuryConfig
docs: Treasury configuration for revenue tracking.

fields.name: treasury_wallet
docs: Treasury wallet pubkey.

fields.name: total_withdrawn
docs: Total SolBalls withdrawn for revenue processing.

fields.name: bump
docs: PDA bump seed.

types.name: VrfRequest
docs: Pending VRF request state. Created when VRF is requested,
read during consume_randomness.

fields.name: request_type
docs: Request type: 0 = spawn, 1 = throw.

fields.name: player
docs: Player who threw (or authority for spawn).

fields.name: slot_index
docs: Pokemon slot index.

fields.name: ball_type
docs: Ball type (for throws).

fields.name: seed
docs: The 32-byte seed used for the ORAO VRF request.

fields.name: is_fulfilled
docs: Whether this request has been fulfilled.

fields.name: bump
docs: PDA bump seed.
